page.title: 05Overview of other schools.
page.content: Apart from{Westhaven,Southill,and {Chickerell Primary Schools}there are {three Infant Schools,two other Primary {Schools and an Independent School}in the area.There is also a{Special {School called Wyvern in Chickerell {Road. Westhaven Infants and Cromwell Road are feeder schools for Westhaven Junior School.{Westhaven Infant School is a modern school with about 140 pupils.{Cromwell Road}has about 60 pupils.{Holy Trinity Infants in Cross {Road}is a feeder School for Holy Trinity Juniors,it has about 160 pupils. { Holy Trinity Juniors}has about 250 pupils.{St.Augustine's is a Catholic {Primary School}in Hardy Avenue.It has about 220 infant/juniors. { Thornlow,an Independent School}has a Junior(80pupils)/Senior sec.(150 boys)
